{{Han char|rn=61|rad=心|as=12|sn=15|four=|canj=PRRU|ids=⿰[[忄]][[㖾]]}}

# (same as [[愕]]) to [[be]] [[startle]]d, [[alarmed]]
# to [[speak out]], to [[speak up]], [[frank]] [[statement]]
# [[obstacle]] or [[hindrance]]
# [[obstruct]], [[impede]]
# [[unwilling]]
# [[disagreeable]]
